text: Hari ubwo wowe (Muhamadi) wareka (kubagezaho) bimwe mu byo uhishurirwa, ndetse n’igituza cyawe kikaremererwa kuko bavuga bati “Kuki atamanuriwe ubutunzi cyangwa ngo azane n’umumalayika (ushimangira ubutumwa bwe)?” (Bagezeho ibyo uhishurirwa, kuko) mu by’ukuri wowe uri umuburizi. Kandi Allah ni Umuhagararizi wa byose
